string.name: name
string.value: Russellon's Items for Experiment
#p2111009#, the alchemist for Alcadno, seems to be in need of something for his experiment. I better go visit #b#p2111009##k.

#p2111009#, an alchemist who works on fighting diseases, asked me to get #b#t4031694##k for him, a crucial ingredient for his medicine. #t4031694# can be found through #o3110302#, and I better take note of the advice that getting it from #o3110303# is much easier than through #o3110302#.\n\n#i4031694##t4031694# #b#c4031694##k/10
Once I gave him all the #t4031694#s, #p2111009# seemed ecstatic and started working on his experiment. ...What kind of a medicine would that be?
...무슨 일이지? 처음 보는 얼굴이군... 그 망토를 보니 알카드노 소속은 확실한 듯한데... 신입인가? 무슨 볼 일이라고 있는 거냐? 귀찮지만... 연구에 관해서라면 뭐든 물어도 좋아... 응? 어떤 연구를 하냐고?
이름은 러셀론. 질병의 원인과 그 해결에 대해 연구를 하고 있지... 자신 있는 것은 독약 제조. 지금 만드는 것도 약이지. 물론 독약은 아니지만....
그러고 보니 재료가 부족한데... 여기에는 인간의 손가락이 필요할 듯하군. 한 개만 주는 게 어때? ...후후훗. 농담이다. 필요한 것은 루모의 잎사귀일 뿐이니까... 하지만 그걸 구하는 건 쉽지 않은데... 네가 조금 도와주지 않겠어? 도와주지 않는다면 대신 네 손가락이라도...
이런. 손가락 이야기는 농담이었는데... 그거 때문에 도와준다고 한 건 아니겠지? 손가락을 재료로 쓰다니... 그럴리가 없잖아? 루모의 잎사귀면 충분하다고...
루모의 잎사귀는 루모에게서 구할 수 있어... 루모가 어디에 있냐고? 그거야 제뉴미스트들이 기르고 있잖아... 좀 가져와도 괜찮아. 어차피 제뉴미스트들 거니까... 그 녀석들이 뭐라고 하던 상관 없으니, 마음대로 가져오라고.
아. 루모의 잎사귀을 따려면 그냥 루모보다는 강화형 루모를 사냥하는 게 좋아... 뭐, 그냥 루모에게서 못 구하는 건 아니지만... 그럼 루모의 잎사귀 10개만 부탁하지...
흐응... 뭐 싫으면 어쩔 수 없겠지... 손가락 이야기는 농담이었어. 걱정 하지 말라고.

I don't think we've ever met. I see that you're wearing the Alcadno Cape... are you a newcomer? What do you want from me? I am busy right now, but... if you have questions about the experiments, I'll answer them for you... what? What kind of experiment am I conducting?

My name is Russellon, and I am conducting experiments on finding out the cause of all sickness, and finding a cure for it... and my expertise lies in creating poison. I am making something now...just not poison.

Now that I think of it, I am short on the ingredients for the medicine... in order to make one, I think I'll need a human finger grinded in there... maybe yours. Hahaha, I was just kidding. No need to worry about that.
What I actually need is #b#t4031694##k... but it's difficult to find one. What do you think, newbie? Can you help me out here? If you don't, then maybe I'll need your finger...
Hmm. I was just kidding about the finger. You're not helping so you can save your finger, right? There's no way I would use a finger as a main ingredient. Seriously.

#t4031694# can be found through #r#o3110302##k... You don't know where #o3110302# is? Zenumists raise them, of course. It doesn't matter what they'll Say, so go to the #bbasement lab of the Zenumist Society#k and bring back as much as you can.

To obtain #t4031694#, you should get it from #r#o3110303##k instead of #o3110302#. You can get it from both of them, but if you can defeat #o3110303#, then it'd be a quicker way to obtain it. Please get me #b10 #t4031694#s#k...
Hmm... if you don't want to help, then there's nothing I can do... I was kidding about the finger.
So you have brought all of #t4031694#s... great work, this should be enough for me to make a medicine...
#t4031694# is like the ultimate form of life. By studying this, I'll be able to make medicines that are more potent and effective than others...
You haven't brought back #b10 #t4031694#s#k yet... #t4031694# is so brittle that it's hard to find one that's solidified. That's also why Zenumists grow plenty of #r#o3110302#s#k...
